mapper.select: select c.id,c.channel_id,c.channel,c.ratio_price from tb_channel c where c.is_del=0 order by c.id

select m.sku_id,m.id numid,yy.id provinceCode,yy.name provinceName,y.id cityCode,y.name cityName, m.num_resource,m.net_type,tt.keyvalue feature,m.low_consume from tb_num m left join tb_city y on m.city_id = y.id left join tb_city yy on y.pid= yy.id left join ( select e.num num,GROUP_CONCAT(t.key_id) keyid, Concat(',', GROUP_CONCAT(t.key_value),',') keyvalue from tb_num_rule e ,tb_dict t where e.`value` = t.key_id and t.key_group='FEATHER_TYPE' and e.num=${num_resource} group by e.num ) tt on m.num_resource = tt.num where 1=1 and m.`status` in (1,2) and m.num_resource=${num_resource}
